sections.text:
17-209.Appointed officers and employees; compensation; fixed by ordinance.

The appointive officials and other employees of the village shall receive such compensation as the chairperson and village board of trustees shall designate by ordinance; and the annual salary of the chairperson and other members of the village board of trustees shall be fixed by ordinance.

SourceLaws 1879, § 48, p. 204;Laws 1885, c. 18, § 1, p. 159;R.S.1913, § 5059;C.S.1922, § 4231;C.S.1929, § 17-209;Laws 1935, c. 36, § 4, p. 149;Laws 1937, c. 32, § 1, p. 157;C.S.Supp.,1941, § 17-209;Laws 1943, c. 30, § 3, p. 140;R.S.1943, § 17-209;Laws 1945, c. 26, § 1, p. 137;Laws 1947, c. 31, § 2(1), p. 141;Laws 1949, c. 21, § 2, p. 92;Laws 1961, c. 49, § 1, p. 190;Laws 1969, c. 89, § 2, p. 452;Laws 2017, LB133, § 71.
